Package arcade.core

Class ARCADE

  • java.lang.Object
    • arcade.core.ARCADE
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PatchARCADE, PottsARCADE
    public abstract class ARCADE
extends java.lang.Object
    Entry point class for ARCADE simulations.

    The class loads two XML files command.xml and parameter.xml that specify the command line parser options and the default parameter values, respectively. The setup XML file is then parsed to produce an array of Series objects, each of which defines replicates (differing only in random seed) of Simulation instances to run.

    If the visualization flag is used, only the first valid Series in the array is run. Otherwise, all valid Series are run.

    An implementing package <implementation> extends this class to define implementation specific:

    • command.<implementation>.xml with custom command line parameters
    • parameter.<implementation>.xml with new default parameter values
    • InputBuilder for building implementation series from the setup XML
    • OutputLoader for loading classes
    • OutputSaver for saving classes

        void runSeries​(java.util.ArrayList<Series> series,

        If the --vis flag is set, then only the first valid series is run. Otherwise, all valid series in the list are run.
